Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute at 115th/Wentworth
ShortDescription: 115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 115th, Halsted, 111th, State, and 115th due to, street blockage near 115th/Wentworth.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 115th, Halsted, 111th, State, and 115th due to, street blockage near 115th/Wentworth.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #71 71st/South ShoreTemporary Eastbound Reroute near 71st/East End
ShortDescription: EB 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, Stony Island, 73rd, Jeffrey and 71st due to street blockage near 71st/East End.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, Stony Island, 73rd, Jeffrey and 71st due to street blockage near 71st/East End.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No Trains Between Damen and Racine
ShortDescription: Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between Damen and Racine due to fire department activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between Damen and Racine due to fire department activity..

As a result, trains are operating in two sections:

  • between O'Hare and Damen, and,
  • between Racine and Forest Park, only.

Shuttle buses are available between Damen and Racine to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
